data.title: Pär Lagerkvist
data.text:
AKA Pär Fabian Lagerkvist

Born: 23-May-1891

Birthplace: Växjö, Sweden

Died: 11-Jul-1974

Location of death: Stockholm, Sweden

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, Lidingö Kyrkogård, Lidingö, Sweden

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Author, Playwright, Novelist

Nationality: Sweden

Executive summary: Barabbas

Wife: (#1, one daughter)

Daughter: (with wife #1)

Wife: Elaine Sandels (m. 1925, div. 1967, two sons)

Son: Ulf

Son: Bengt

Nobel Prize for Literature 1951

Is the subject of books:

Pär Lagerkvist, 1973, BY: Robert Donald Spector

Author of books:

Ordkonst och Bildkonst (1913)

Teater (1918)

Ångest (1916, "Anguish")

Det Eviga Leendet (1920)

Gäst hos Verkligheten (1925, novel)

Hjärtats Sånger (1926, poetry, "Songs of the Heart")

Det Besegrade Livet (1927)

Bödeln (1933, novella, "The Hangman")

Dvärgen (1944, novel)

Barabbas (1950, novel)

Wrote plays:

Mannen utan Själ (1936, "The Man Without a Soul")

Låt Människan Leva (1949, "Let Man Live")

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
